description:
Check out this action-packed new clip from Marvel Animation's X-Men '97 to learn why you don't mess with the Summers. Marvel Animation’s X-Men’97 revisits the iconic era of the 1990s as The X-Men, a band of mutants who use their uncanny gifts to protect a world that hates and fears them, are challenged like never before, forced to face a dangerous and unexpected new future. 

The all-new series features 10 episodes. The voice cast includes Ray Chase as Cyclops, Jennifer Hale as Jean Grey, Alison Sealy-Smith as Storm, Cal Dodd as Wolverine, JP Karliak as Morph, Lenore Zann as Rogue, George Buza as Beast, AJ LoCascio as Gambit, Holly Chou as Jubilee, Isaac Robinson-Smith as Bishop, Matthew Waterson as Magneto, and Adrian Hough as Nightcrawler. 

Beau DeMayo serves as head writer; episodes are directed by Jake Castorena, Chase Conley and Emi Yonemura, and the series is executive produced by Brad Winderbaum, Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Victoria Alonso and DeMayo. Featuring music by the
title: X-Men '97 - Official 'Summers Family Road Trip' Clip (2024) Ray Chase, Jennifer Hale
IGN Taste Test: Star Wars Blue Milk #starwars #bluemilk #taste #drink #blue #milk #dairy #ign

description:
Hide the Corpse is a VR physics-based puzzle game developed by Realcast. Players must grab, drag, and contort the body and objects you find around the environment to stash the body in one of the available hiding places before the place is crawling with cops. Hide the body in the allotted time across 10 levels and 60 hiding spots. Hide the Corpse Kickstarter is available to support now with a demo available now for Meta Quest.

#IGN
title: Hide the Corpse - Official Announcement Trailer

description:
Watch the latest trailer for Halo Infinite to see what to expect with the latest update, Operation: Banished Honor, which features a free, 20-tier Operation Pass filled with customization rewards and Spartan Points – a new, free currency that’s also earned via Daily Challenges and the weekly Ultimate Reward. Players can also upgrade to the Premium Pass to obtain the Fuego Flame armor coating. Halo Infinite's Operation: Banished Honor will be available from April 30 to June 4, 2024.

#IGN #Gaming #HaloInfinite
title: Halo Infinite - Official Banished Honor Trailer
GTA 6 trailer but with Michael, Franklin, Trevor (side-by-side comparison) (video by @JANTSUU)

description:
The Fallout 4 Next Gen update is here, riding the wave of hype from the Fallout TV Show. However the Fallout 4 next gen update isn't blowing people away. Free for all players and PS5, Xbox Series X|S now get a native version for the first time rather than the Backwards Compatibility version, with boosts, available till now. Just what changes, improves here for all and is this a win for all players. Graphics, performance and bugs are all covered in our Fallout 4 Next Gen IGN Performance Review.
Chapters

0:00 Introduction
0:33 What the update offers and the Xbox issues
6:31 Performance testing PS5, Xbox Series X|S and 120Hz modes
10:18 Summary
title: Fallout 4 Next Gen Update Performance Review (PS5 vs Xbox Series X|S)

description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Square Enix has issued a warning to investors that it will absorb significant losses for the fiscal year that ended in March 2024. The publisher and developer also said it is going to be "more selective and focused" in how it spends its resources. The recently released Final Fantasy 7: Rebirth is rumored to be struggling with sales, and their Splatoon-like multiplayer game, Foamstars, appears to be a dud. In other news, Microsoft has announced the lineup of games for Xbox Game Pass May 2024 Wave 1. Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition leads the way, with an updated version of Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons, Kona II: Brume, and more on the way. And finally, Bethesda's Todd Howard explains why their Fallout games will always be set in America, even though the nuclear apocalypse was a worldwide event.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Square Enix Takes $140 Million Hit on 'Content Abandonment Losses' - IGN Daily Fix

description:
Star Wars: Hunters is a free-to-play third-person competitive arena combat game developed by NaturalMotion. Players will battle it out on iconic locations across the Star Wars universe as customizable Hunters as new characters or legendary icons such as Bounty Hunters, heroes of the Rebellion and Imperial stormtroopers, and more. Star Wars: Hunters is launching on June 4 for iOS, Android, and Nintendo Switch.

#IGN #Gaming #StarWars
title: Star Wars: Hunters - Official Launch Date Reveal Trailer

description:
Arizona Sunshine 2 is a VR online co-op zombie shooter developed by Vertigo Studios. Arizona Sunshine's Horde Mode has just received a new map with Undead Valley. Explore and fight through the revamped zombie-infested transport warehouse alongside all-new changes and enhancements from the original level in Arizona Sunshine. The Undead Valley Horde Mode Map in Arizona Sunshine 2 is available now for Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, Steam VR, PICO, and PlayStation VR2 (PS VR2).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Arizona Sunshine 2 - Official Undead Valley Horde Mode Map Trailer
Here’s what everyone starting Sea of Thieves on PlayStation needs to know! Presented by @McDonalds

description:
Check out the BattleCore Arena trailer for the free-to-play competitive platform shooter developed by Ubisoft Bordeaux. Players will control spherical cores and duke it out in vertically inclined maps by rolling, dashing, and jumping to outmaneuver opponents through the game's physics-based movement system. BattleCore Arena is launching soon for PC.

#Gaming #BattleCoreArena #IGN
title: BattleCore Arena - Official Trailer

description:
Check out the Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes final trailer for the upcoming movie starring Owen Teague (“IT”), Freya Allan (“The Witcher”), Kevin Durand (“Locke & Key”), Peter Macon (“Shameless”), and William H. Macy (“Fargo”). 

Director Wes Ball breathes new life into the global, epic franchise set several generations in the future following Caesar’s reign, in which apes are the dominant species living harmoniously and humans have been reduced to living in the shadows. As a new tyrannical ape leader builds his empire, one young ape undertakes a harrowing journey that will cause him to question all that he has known about the past and to make choices that will define a future for apes and humans alike.

The screenplay for Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes is by Josh Friedman (“War of the Worlds”) and Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver (“Avatar: The Way of Water”) and Patrick Aison (“Prey”), based on characters created by Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver, and the producers are Wes Ball, Joe Hart
title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes - Official Final Trailer (2024) Owen Teague, Freya Allan

description:
Watch the latest Killing Floor 3 trailer to see the formidable Scrake from this upcoming action-horror shooter game. Killing Floor 3 will be available on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X/S.

Since its introduction 18 years ago, the BW-06 series has been deployed in more than 7,500 engagements. Now Horzine introduces the C line, extending the already considerable capabilities of this formidable bioweapon. Let the BW-06C take the lead, exposing the enemy to your infiltration units as it skillfully saws through armored vehicles, bunkers, and other fortifications.

#KillingFloor #Gaming #IGN
title: Killing Floor 3 - Official Scrake Reveal Trailer

description:
Sam and Rhodey have a heart-to-heart and bond over flying in this exclusive deleted scene from Marvel Studios’ The Falcon and The Winter Soldier: The Complete First Season, now available as a Collector's Edition on 4K UHD and Blu-ray.

Marvel Studios’ The Falcon and The Winter Soldier stars Anthony Mackie as Sam Wilson, aka The Falcon, and Sebastian Stan as Bucky Barnes, aka The Winter Soldier. The pair, who came together in the final moments of Avengers: Endgame, team up on a global adventure that tests their abilities — and patience.

#IGN #Marvel #MCU
title: The Falcon and The Winter Soldier - Exclusive Deleted Scene (2024) Anthony Mackie, Don Cheadle

description: Get a look at gameplay from Funko Fusion, the upcoming Funko Pop-based co-op action game that blends a full 20(!) different hit franchises, such as Jurassic World, Back to the Future, JAWS, Chucky, Masters of the Universe, and many more. Funko Fusion will be released for PC and consoles on September 13.
title: Funko Fusion: Release Date Gameplay Trailer

description:
Watch the latest Dragon Ball Sparking ZERO trailer for another look at the upcoming game in the Budokai Tenkaichi series. Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero is a 3D anime fighting developed by Spike Chunsoft. Get a glimpse at some Dragon Ball Sparking Zero gameplay for the upcoming game featuring iconic characters from the Dragon Ball franchise.

Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero is coming to PS5 (PlayStation 5) Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#DragonBall #Gaming #IGN
title: Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero - Official Master and Apprentice Trailer

description: Gray Zone Warfare is available now in Steam Early Access. Watch the Early Access launch trailer for Gray Zone Warfare to see various features of this military shooter game, including customization options, playstyles, and more.
title: Gray Zone Warfare - Official Early Access Launch Trailer
